title: Loving Hut - Warynskiego
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: The second Loving Hut location in Warsaw, opened Nov 2013. Part of international chain of vegan food restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts.
